name: Sneaky Boy (Koke2302)
description:
Sneaky boy is a stealth game based on reality shows. Your main goal is stealing the delicious cookies that are in the kitchen, but there are a lot of cameras that can get you caught. In order to avoid them, you will have to use your phone and see where they are aiming at, and get past them without being noticed.

Developers: 

Jorge Durán - Twitter: @jorgedgq99 

Jorge Sánchez - Twitter: @Koke232

Enjoy it!
